overview: Everyone has an opinion of the Duckmen’s beards...men love ‘em, women hate ‘em and ducks fear them! Fear the Beard, featuring duck hunting legend Phil Robertson and the Duckmen, takes you to the swamps of Louisiana for some of the best waterfowl action in the country.
tagline: Fear the Beard, takes you to the swamps of Louisiana for some of the best waterfowl action in the country
title: Duckmen 13: Fear The Beard
